import LightColors from '@site/src/components/Docs/Colors/LightColors';

The [theme object](#basethemetcolors) is where you define your application's color palette, type scale, borders, border radius values, and more.

:::info
First of all you need to install `@flexnative/theme-context`.
Fallow instructions here on **[how to install and how to use](../getting-started/installation.mdx)** `@flexnative/theme-context`.
:::

## BaseTheme\<TColors\>

:::note
**`TColors`** it is opbect template for extra colors.
See using custom colors [section](./customizing-theme.mdx)
:::

|  Name   | Type | Required | Default Value | Description |
| -- | -- | -- | -- | -- |
| colors | [`BaseColors`](#basecolors) & `TColors` | ***true*** | [`BaseColors`](#basecolors) | Default theme colors.<br /> You can add whatever values you want to the theme, and they will be merged with the default. |
| scheme  | [`ColorSchemeName`](https://reactnative.dev/docs/usecolorscheme#supported-color-schemes) | **false** | Device color scheme. | Theme [`ColorSchemeName`](https://reactnative.dev/docs/usecolorscheme#supported-color-schemes)  |
| borderWidth | [`Record<BorderWidth, number>`](#borderwidth) | ***true*** | [`BorderWidth`](#borderwidth) | Border width used by components. |
| borderRadius | [`Record<BorderRadius, number>`](#borderradius) | ***true*** | [`BorderRadius`](#borderradius) | Border radius used by components. |
| fontSize | [`Record<FontSize, number>`](#fontsize) | ***true*** | [`FontSize`](#fontsize) | Font size used by components. |
| metrics | [`object`](#metrics) | ***true*** | [`metrics`](#metrics) | Base constants values used by components. |

### BaseColors
Default theme colors.
You can add whatever values you want to the theme, and they will be merged with the default.
<LightColors />

### BorderWidth
Border width used by components.
One of `'none' | 'hairline' | 'thin' | 'base' | 'thick' | number`

|  Name  | Type | Value |
| ------- | ---- | ----- |
| none | `number` | 0 |
| hairline | `number` | [`StyleSheet.hairlineWidth`](https://reactnative.dev/docs/stylesheet#hairlinewidth) |
| thin | `number` | 1 |
| base | `number` | 2 |
| thick | `number` | 3 |

### BorderRadius
Border radius used by components.
One of `'none' | 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | 'full' | number`

|  Name   | Type | Value |
| ------- | ---- | ----- |
| none | `number` | 0 |
| small | `number` | 2 |
| medium | `number` | 4 |
| large | `number` | 6 |
| full | `number` | 99999 |

### FontSize
Font size used by components.
One of `'small' | 'default' | 'medium' | 'large'`

|  Name   | Type | Value |
| ------- | ---- | ----- |
| small | `number` | [metrics.basSize](#basesize) * 0.75 |
| default | `number` | [metrics.basSize](#basesize) |
| medium | `number` | [metrics.basSize](#basesize) * 1.25 |
| large | `number` | [metrics.basSize](#basesize) * 1.5 |

### metrics
Base constants values used by components.

|  Name   | Type | Value | Description |
| ------- | ---- | ----- | ----------- |
| <span id='basesize'>baseSize</span> | `number` | 16 | Base size used in fontSize. |
| disabledOpacity | `number` | 0.4 | Opacity style property value for disabled components. |
| ghostOpacity | `string` | 40 | Color opacity for components with 'ghost' appearance. |
| ghostActiveOpacity | `string` | 73 | Color opacity for components with 'ghost' appearance in active sate. |
| verticalMultiplier | `number` | 0.6 | A constant multiplayer for components vertical padding. |
| horizontalMultiplier | `number` | 16 | A constant multiplayer for components horizontal padding. |
